extendedInfo.description: Stream and listen to your favorite SoundCloud tracks, browse search and download tunes from other artists, groups or genres, and keep finding new music to listen to from SoundCloud on your mobile phone! Follow other users, view artist profiles, share on Twitter, Facebook, Email etc, and comment on tunes directly from your Android phone.** Latest Version:* Fixed White screen issue on ICE_CREAM_SANDWICH* Fix for crash on Samsung Galaxy S2* Automatically publish SoundCloud Favorites & NowPlaying tracks to Twitter* Automatically publish SoundCloud Favorites & NowPlaying tracks to Facebook** Top Rated Music app for SoundCloud in the Amazon Android App Store **** v1.8 Critical Fix: Login crashes for some devices. **** v1.7 Fixed Download track issue on Samsung and other devices with Android OS 2.1 and less. **** New Support for Sony and LG LTE Devices **If you see issues, please contact us at soundgarage@dirtywaterlabs.com.Features:- Browse your tracks, groups, favorites- Seamless streaming and playback- Download Tracks to SDCard- Listen to your and others users Favorite tracks- Listen to tracks from other artists- Listen to live recorded DJ Sets and Mixes- Listen to recorded messages and Podcasts- Listen to "Private tracks"- Listen to Creative Commons music- Browse by Genre and Groups- Browse People you follow or following you- Search Tracks, Groups, People, Genre- Share Tracks, Share Group, Share User Profile on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Blogspot, Email etc.- Follow/Unfollow other users- Artists Recommendations from Echo Nest- SoundClouder of the Day (#SCOTD)Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/SoundGarageMobilev1.8----- Critical Fix: Login or Sign-in was causing a crash on some devices.- Critical Fix: Logout Issue. Re-login after logout was causing API errors.- Fix: Browse by Genre- Fix: Search by keyword was blocking UI.- Fix: UI loading optimizations.- Added: More Genres (Acoustic, Country, Folk, Comedy, Podcasts, Spoken Word etc)v1.7-----Fixed: Downloading issue on Samsung Devices or other devices with Android 2.1 or lessFixed: Track Search by GenreFixed: Issue of track playback stopping on on some devices upon screen lock.Fixed reported bugs and crashes.Ability to navigate to currently playing track from any screenUpdated SoundCloud APIsOptimizations on data calls & screen renderingAdded: Ability to Rate the applicationAdded: Ability to Like Us on Facebook and Follow us on TwitterDecreased the size of the application.

reviews.title: Sensation xe
reviews.comment: Sweet app. As usual, I suspect a few cases of \'faulty end user\' might be to blame for negative comments.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app but 2 things are missing
reviews.comment: It really needs a download progress bar, either in the app itself or in the notifications. It also jumps to the next track when your internet starts going slow on 3G - in the middle of a long sh mix this is annoying - it would bei nice if there was a setting to retry instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!! WASTE OF MONEY
reviews.comment: What the f#\302\260k this is th\303\251 worst app i have ever paid for! It doesnt download anything you can search up songs it keeps closing and having errors

reviews.title: Constant error popups
reviews.comment: Can\'t get beyond signing in without experiencing constant errors.  Can\'t say I\'m too happy with this app.

reviews.title: Suggestion
reviews.comment: Can you update this to have a tab that we can add our favorite user accounts? Add a star system where we can tap the star and instantly add them to a custom tab of accounts we follow.
